title: Satti Suttathada Lyrics Aalayamani
stanzas:
Satti suttathadaa
kai vittathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa

Satti suttathadaa
kai vittathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa

Paadhi manadhil
dheivam irundhu
paarthu kondathadaa
meedhi manadhil
mirugam irundhu
aatti vaithathadaa (2)

aatti vaitha mirugam
indru adangi vittathadaa(2)
amaidhi dheivam
muzhu manadhil
kovil kondathadaa

Satti suttathadaa
kai vittathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa

aaravaara peigal ellaam
oadivittathadaa
aalaiya mani oasai
nenjil koodi vittathadaa

Dharmathevan kovilile
oli sulanguthadaa
manam santhi santhi
santhi endru
oaivu kondathadaa

Satti suttathadaa
kai vittathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa

erumbu tholai
urithu paarkka
yaanai vandhathadaa
naan idhaya tholai
urithu paarka
gyaanam vandhathadaa(2)

Satti suttathadaa
kai vittathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa
buthi kettathadaa
nenjai thottathadaa
